name: Elemental painting
description:
Made during the Paint Jam 2021

Taken challenges  (exept made with Paint):

  • Only use the default MS Paint color palette
  • No meshes except for like the world/levels
  • Draw your assets without a drawing tablet (didn't have one ;)

Game description :
Gather the 5 baguette (yes we are French)
You will have a flask filed with elemental paint gather from the groud.
It will permit you to Create new platform and destroy barriers.
The flask will quikly change element if the actual element is weak agains the one your walking on.

Finelame8815 & Pielloy
